item.title: 工人暴露于辐射后，三星被罚款高达 7,900 美元
item.description: 由于一家半导体工厂的员工受到辐射，三星电子公司被韩国监管机构处以高达 1050 万韩元（7900 美元）的罚款。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. was fined as much as 10.5 million won ($7,900) by South Korean regulators after employees at a semiconductor plant were exposed to radiation.】

item.title: 法国债券收益率自 2007 年以来首次超过西班牙
item.description: 由于投资者质疑法国政府堵住公共财政漏洞的能力，债券投资者要求持有法国债券的收益率高于评级较低的西班牙债务，这是 2007 年以来的第一次。【原文：Bond investors are demanding a higher yield to hold French bonds than lower-rated Spanish debt for the first time since 2007, as investors question the government’s ability to plug a hole in public finances.】

item.title: 前港交所总裁李小加在澳门启动微型交易所
item.description: 香港证券交易所前总裁在邻近的澳门创办了一家交易所，为中国微型企业上市服务。【原文：A former head of the Hong Kong stock exchange has launched an exchange in neighboring Macau to list Chinese micro businesses.】

item.title: 坎德里亚姆称英镑涨势将终结，因为市场对英国央行的路线判断有误
item.description: Candriam 的一位基金经理表示，英镑的涨势看起来很脆弱，随着市场开始对英国更大幅度的降息进行定价，英镑可能会大幅下跌。【原文：The pound’s rally looks vulnerable and the currency could fall sharply as markets start to price in deeper interest-rate cuts in the UK, according to a fund manager at Candriam.】

item.title: 德国商业银行将于明天与联合信贷银行举行首次会议
item.description: 即将上任的德国商业银行首席执行官贝蒂娜-奥洛普（Bettina Orlopp）表示，该银行的领导层将于周五与意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）举行会议，因为这家意大利银行正在为潜在的收购做准备。【原文：Incoming Commerzbank AG Chief Executive Officer Bettina Orlopp said the lender’s leadership will have a meeting with UniCredit SpA on Friday as the Italian lender prepares a potential takeover.】

item.title: 迪拜通过更严格的加密货币投资营销规则
item.description: 迪拜的加密货币监管机构更新了其虚拟资产营销指南，新规则要求企业在免责声明中说明此类投资的风险。【原文：Dubai’s crypto regulator updated its marketing guidelines for virtual assets, with the new rules requiring firms to include a disclaimer clarifying the risks of such investments.】

item.title: 南非家庭财富增至一年来最高水平
item.description: 南非央行表示，由于南非家庭资产市值的增长超过了负债的增长，南非家庭财富在第二季度有所增长，部分原因是股市的强劲反弹。【原文：South Africa’s household wealth rose in the second quarter as an increase in the market value of their assets outstripped that of their liabilities — in part due to a strong stock market rally, the central bank said.】

item.title: H&M 扩大在中国的电子商务业务以巩固份额
item.description: Hennes & Mauritz AB 正在扩大其在中国的在线市场，计划在拼多多和豆瓣等电子商务平台开设店面。【原文：Hennes & Mauritz AB is expanding its online marketplace presence in China, planning storefronts on e-commerce platforms including Pinduoduo and Douyin.】

item.title: 经济刺激政策出台后，顶级投资者纷纷套现离场
item.description: 过去一周，一些中国公司的股东从所持股票中套现超过 10 亿美元，利用了中国经济肾上腺素激增带来的市场环境改善。【原文：Shareholders in some Chinese companies have cashed out more than $1 billion from their holdings in the past week, taking advantage of improving market conditions brought on by an adrenaline shot to the country’s economy.】

item.title: 三文鱼巨头莫维公司将把收获量提高 20%，并削减成本
item.description: 世界上最大的三文鱼养殖户莫维-阿萨（Mowi ASA）计划将年产量提高 20%，并降低成本，以满足对粉红肉鲑鱼日益增长的需求，尽管该行业正与疾病和虱子的影响作斗争。【原文：Mowi ASA, the world’s biggest salmon farmer, plans to increase its annual harvest by 20% and cut costs to meet growing demand for the pink-fleshed fish even as the industry struggles with the effects of disease and lice.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司遭更多评级机构下调评级，资金紧张迫在眉睫
item.description: 两家信用评级机构进一步下调了泰晤士水务公司的债务评级，因为这家陷入困境的公用事业公司面临着潜在的流动性危机。【原文：Thames Water’s debt was further downgraded by two credit ratings agencies as the troubled utility faces a potential liquidity crunch.】

item.title: 维修公司警告：亚洲喷气机维修紧缺问题将持续存在
item.description: 亚洲增长最快的喷气机维护、修理和运营公司之一警告说，在需求激增的情况下，亚洲迅速扩张的航空公司可能会面临漫长的飞机维修和保养等待。【原文：Asia’s rapidly expanding airlines may face long waits to have their aircraft repaired and maintained amid surging demand, one of the region’s fastest-growing jet maintenance, repair and operations firms has warned.】

item.title: 韩国 8,600 亿美元养老基金将把外汇预购增加两倍
item.description: 韩国将从 10 月份开始，把国民养老金管理局每月可提前购买的外汇上限提高两倍，达到 30 亿美元，以缓解外汇市场的波动，因为养老基金正寻求增加其海外投资。【原文：South Korea will triple the maximum amount of foreign currency that the National Pension Service can buy in advance to $3 billion per month starting October, to mitigate foreign exchange market fluctuations as the pension fund seeks to boost its overseas investments.】

item.title: 韩国央行考虑加息，首尔公寓价格增长放缓，房地产降温迹象初显
item.description: 首尔的公寓价格增长速度连续第二周放缓，这支持了央行考虑最早在下个月调整政策的观点。【原文：Price growth for apartments in Seoul slowed for a second week, supporting the case for the central bank to consider a policy pivot as early as next month.】

item.title: H&M 称六月寒冷天气后将无法实现利润目标
item.description: 瑞典服装零售商 Hennes & Mauritz AB 表示，今年不太可能实现一个关键的利润目标，因为欧洲的一个炎热夏季损害了该公司的销售额。【原文：Hennes & Mauritz AB said it’s unlikely to hit a key profit target this year after a washed-out summer in Europe hurt sales at the Swedish clothing retailer.】

item.title: 泽连斯基的助手在战争批评后会见中国高级外交官
item.description: 就在乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）加强批评中国政府协助俄罗斯发动战争后数小时，乌克兰总统办公室主任和外交政策负责人与中国最高外交官举行了罕见的会晤。【原文：The head of Ukraine’s presidential office and the country’s foreign policy chief held a rare meeting with China’s top diplomat just hours after President Volodymyr Zelenskiy ramped up his criticism of Beijing for aiding Russia’s war.】

item.title: PayPay 提供数字工资支付，促进无现金贸易
item.description: 日本最大的基于二维码的支付应用 PayPay Corp. 增加了一项功能，允许公司以数字方式向员工支付部分工资，这是日本推动无现金交易的最新尝试。【原文：Japan’s largest QR-code based payment app PayPay Corp. has added a function that allows companies to pay employees part of their salaries digitally, the latest attempt at boosting the country’s cashless transactions.】

item.title: Old Mutual 将于 2025 年开设新的南非银行
item.description: Old Mutual Ltd. 将于明年第一季度推出南非最新的银行，这将加剧这个 85% 的居民都在贷款机构开设账户的国家的竞争。【原文：Old Mutual Ltd. will unveil South Africa’s newest bank in the first quarter of next year, intensifying competition in a nation where 85% of residents have accounts with lenders.】

item.title: 土耳其股票投资者担心利率正常化将终结 440% 的涨幅
item.description: 在超低利率时代，土耳其的证券交易所成为居民保护其储蓄免受通胀飙升影响的首选途径。现在，随着紧缩货币政策将持续到明年，股票市场的繁荣正在迅速消退。【原文：During the era of ultra-low interest rates, Turkey’s stock exchange became the preferred way for residents to protect their savings from surging inflation. Now, with tighter monetary policy seen lasting well into next year, the equities boom is fading fast.】

item.title: Just Eat 外卖与 Lovehoney 达成新协议，将提供性玩具
item.description: Just Eat Takeaway.com NV 已与情趣用品制造商 Lovehoney Group 合作，这是这家在线外卖公司向非食品类拓展的最新举措。【原文：Just Eat Takeaway.com NV has partnered with sex-toy maker Lovehoney Group, the latest move by the online delivery company to expand into non-food categories.】

item.title: 巴斯夫寻求改革，降低股息，专注于核心部门
item.description: 巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）正在重新制定战略，目标是降低股息支付，同时在未来回购大约 40 亿欧元（45 亿美元）的股票。【原文：BASF SE is resetting its strategy, targeting lower dividend payments alongside future share buybacks in the region of €4 billion ($4.5 billion).】

item.title: 电动汽车市场放缓，电池制造商 SK On 意图裁员
item.description: 韩国电池生产商SK On Co.正在向员工提供自愿措施，以缩减员工人数，因为该行业正努力应对电动汽车销售放缓的问题。【原文：South Korean battery producer SK On Co. is offering employees voluntary measures meant to shrink its workforce, as the industry grapples with electric vehicle sales’ slowdown.】

item.title: 政治局誓言为实现目标提供财政支持，中国股市大涨
item.description: 在国家最高领导人誓言为实现年度经济和社会发展目标提供财政支持后，中国股市延续涨势。【原文：Chinese stocks extended their rally after the nation’s top leaders vowed fiscal support to achieve its annual economic and social development goals.】

item.description: 英国二十英镑纸币。摄影师：Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg克里斯-拉特克利夫/布鲁姆伯格【原文：British twenty pound notes. Photographer: Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg】

item.title: 韩国对中国产不锈钢展开倾销调查
item.description: 韩国对从中国进口的不锈钢板发起了反倾销调查，这增加了对来自世界第二大经济体的产品设置新贸易壁垒的可能性。【原文：South Korea has launched an anti-dumping investigation into imports of stainless steel plates made in China, raising the prospect of new trade barriers to products from the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 泰国警告水坝溢洪将导致重要旅游城市发生洪灾
item.description: 泰国警告说，随着暴雨持续不断、河流泛滥和水坝达到最高容量，该国著名的旅游胜地之一将发生更多洪灾。【原文：Thailand warned of more floods in one of the nation’s popular tourist destinations as heavy rains continue, rivers overflow and dams reach peak capacity.】

item.title: 世界上最受欢迎的植物油不再是最便宜的了
item.description: 由于最大种植国的产量缩减，而主要替代品供应充足，棕榈油失去了世界上最廉价食用油的地位。【原文：Palm oil has lost its position as the world’s cheapest edible oil, thanks to shrinking output in the biggest growers and plentiful supply of the main alternative.】

item.title: 能源罢工影响乌克兰经济增长，欧洲复兴开发银行下调乌克兰经济增长预测
item.description: 据欧洲复兴开发银行（European Bank for Reconstruction and Development）称，俄罗斯对乌克兰能源基础设施的攻击使乌克兰经济遭受重创，迫使其在建设替代能源的同时不得不依赖更加昂贵的进口。【原文：Ukraine is taking an economic hit from Russian attacks on its energy infrastructure, forcing it to rely on more expensive imports as it builds alternative sources, according to the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development.】
